# Amazon Prime Big Deal Days 早期优惠：AirPods、iPad 及更多

亚马逊正在举办名为“Prime Big Deal Days”的年度Prime Day活动，为购物者提供假日购物的首次优惠机会。该活动为期两天（10月7日至8日），目前亚马逊商店已推出大量早期优惠，涵盖科技、服装、视频游戏、杂货等多个品类。

![Prime Big Deal Days Hero 3](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TK2hKdItZKj9aBS_LaOZPpbD-gY=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/Prime-Big-Deal-Days-Hero-3.jpg?lossy)

本文重点关注在此48小时活动期间可在亚马逊购买的苹果及苹果相关产品的折扣，包括AirPods、iPad Air、iPad mini和各种配件。这些优惠具有时效性，可能很快消失或出现新的折扣。

## Prime 会员要求

要享受这些折扣，必须拥有亚马逊Prime会员资格。Prime会员费用如下：
*   **月费**：每月14.99美元
*   **年费**：每年139.00美元
*   **新用户**：提供30天免费试用
*   **2025年特别优惠**：针对18-24岁的年轻人提供Prime Young Adults六个月免费试用，之后年费为69.00美元（常规Prime价格的一半）。

## 主要优惠产品

### AirPods

多款AirPods型号在此周末有折扣，其中最值得关注的是：
*   **AirPods 4**：89.99美元（原价129.00美元）
*   **AirPods Pro 2**：也有大幅折扣

![airpods 4 prime day fall](https://images.macrumors.com/t/c_JQ8Yvp6cZtBmxqm9P6ObqlFkQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/airpods-4-prime-day-fall.jpeg?lossy)

### M3 iPad Air

亚马逊的M3 iPad Air提供150美元的折扣，许多型号达到历史最低价。优惠涵盖Wi-Fi和蜂窝网络型号。

*   **11英寸 M3 iPad Air (Wi-Fi)**：
    *   128GB：449.00美元（原价599.00美元）
    *   256GB：549.00美元（原价699.00美元）
    *   512GB：749.00美元（原价899.00美元）
    *   1TB：949.00美元（原价1,099.00美元）
*   **13英寸 M3 iPad Air (Wi-Fi)**：
    *   128GB：649.00美元（原价799.00美元）
    *   256GB：749.00美元（原价899.00美元）
    *   512GB：949.00美元（原价1,099.00美元）
    *   1TB：1,149.00美元（原价1,299.00美元）
*   **蜂窝网络型号**：同样享受150美元折扣，例如128GB蜂窝版11英寸iPad Air为599.00美元，128GB蜂窝版13英寸iPad Air为799.00美元，均创历史新低。

![ipad air prime day fall](https://images.macrumors.com/t/5BHW01EVdWTDb3j-b1MremYuuU4=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ipad-air-prime-day-fall.jpeg?lossy)

### iPad Mini 7

iPad mini 7的多数Wi-Fi型号价格较低，部分蜂窝网络型号也有优惠。这些折扣是iPad mini 7的次佳价格，比历史最低价高出约20美元。

Amazon is hosting another Prime Day event this year, called Prime Big Deal Days and offering shoppers the first chance to save on holiday shopping from a major retailer. Similar to last year's fall Prime Day, it will last for two days (October 7-8) and you can already find a large selection of early deals across Amazon's storefront, covering savings on tech, clothing, video games, groceries, and much, much more.

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with Amazon. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

For our coverage, we're focusing on Apple and Apple-related discounts that can be purchased during this 48-hour event on Amazon. As of today, this includes deals on AirPods, iPad Air, iPad mini, and various accessories.

EARLY SAVINGS
Amazon Prime Big Deal Days


As is typical for Prime Day deals, these markdowns are very time sensitive, so sales listed below may disappear fast, and new ones may appear even faster. With this in mind, we'll keep this article updated throughout the event, and keep an eye on the MacRumors front page as we'll be posting particularly great deals in separate articles this week.

Lastly, and perhaps most importantly, Amazon Prime Day requires you to have an Amazon Prime membership to take advantage of the discounts. Amazon Prime costs $14.99 per month or $139.00 per year, and it comes with a 30-day free trial for new subscribers.

items.title: 缅怀史蒂夫·乔布斯 (原标题: Remembering Steve Jobs)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### 缅怀史蒂夫·乔布斯：逝世十四周年

文章纪念了史蒂夫·乔布斯逝世十四周年。乔布斯于56岁时离世，就在苹果发布iPhone 4S和Siri的仅仅一天之后。

![史蒂夫·乔布斯](https://images.macrumors.com/t/YyDGfj3w3TQaVDbSDfGNdd9u7ks=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/Remembering-Steve-Jobs.jpg?lossy)

### 蒂姆·库克的悼念

苹果CEO蒂姆·库克再次向乔布斯致敬。他在今天的帖子中表示：
*   “史蒂夫将未来视为一个光明而无限的地方，照亮了前进的道路，并激励我们追随。”
*   “我们想念你，我的朋友。”

库克在2017年史蒂夫·乔布斯剧院首次活动（当时发布了iPhone X）开幕时也曾提及乔布斯，他说：“没有一天我们不思念他。”

### 乔布斯遗产的延续

为了纪念和传承乔布斯的精神，以下资源仍在发挥作用：
*   **史蒂夫·乔布斯档案网站（Steve Jobs Archive）**：该网站收录了乔布斯的语录、照片、视频和电子邮件，并为年轻创作者提供奖学金，鼓励他们追随乔布斯的脚步。
*   **苹果官网“缅怀史蒂夫”页面**：苹果网站上仍保留着一个“缅怀史蒂夫”页面，其中包含了全球客户在乔布斯2011年去世后分享的悼念信息。
items.shortSummary: 文章纪念了史蒂夫·乔布斯逝世十四周年。他于56岁离世，就在苹果发布iPhone 4S和Siri后一天。苹果CEO蒂姆·库克再次发文悼念，称乔布斯“照亮了前进的道路，并激励我们追随”。史蒂夫·乔布斯档案网站和苹果官网的“缅怀史蒂夫”页面持续传承着他的遗产，收录语录、照片并分享全球客户的悼念。
items.content:
Today marks the 14th anniversary of Steve Jobs passing away, at the age of 56. He died just one day after Apple unveiled the iPhone 4S and Siri.


Apple CEO Tim Cook has once again paid tribute to Jobs.

"Steve saw the future as a bright and boundless place, lit the path forward, and inspired us to follow," said Cook, in a post today. "We miss you, my friend."

Cook also reflected on Jobs while opening Apple's first-ever event at Steve Jobs Theater in 2017.

"There is not a day that goes by that we don't think about him," he said then.


At that event, Apple unveiled the iPhone X, which was a major update to the smartphone that Jobs had famously unveiled in 2007.

The Steve Jobs Archive website contains a collection of quotes, photos, videos, and emails from Jobs, and offers fellowships to young creators to follow in his footsteps. In addition, Apple still has a "Remembering Steve" page on its website with condolences shared by customers around the world following his death in 2011.
Tag: Steve Jobs

This article, "Remembering Steve Jobs" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 下一代iPad Pro将拥有两大关键特性，但一项传闻仍不确定 (原标题: Next iPad Pro to Have Two Key Features, But One Rumor Still Uncertain)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 下一代iPad Pro主要特性与传闻

根据近期泄露的信息，下一代iPad Pro预计将迎来两项关键升级，但一项关于双前置摄像头的传闻仍存在不确定性。

## 主要升级点

*   **M5芯片**
    *   泄露的Geekbench 6基准测试结果显示，M5芯片的多核CPU性能比当前M4芯片提升高达12%。
    *   图形性能比当前M4芯片提升高达36%。
*   **最低12GB内存**
    *   配备256GB存储空间的iPad Pro型号将拥有12GB内存，与iPhone Air、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max的配置类似。
    *   作为对比，当前M4芯片的iPad Pro在256GB或512GB存储配置下配备8GB内存，而1TB或2TB存储配置则配备16GB内存。

## 泄露来源与可信度

这些信息主要来自俄罗斯YouTube频道Wylsacom和Romancev768上传的13英寸下一代iPad Pro的开箱视频。由于这些频道去年曾成功泄露M4芯片的14英寸MacBook Pro，因此本次泄露被认为具有较高可信度。

![ipad pro 2024](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7rxyhqBCwKf7A_UN7EUtoGJebk8=/400x0/article-new/2024/05/ipad-pro-2024.jpg?lossy)

## 设计与外观

*   预计今年不会有重大的设计改变（去年更新了OLED显示屏和更薄的设计）。
*   开箱视频显示，新机型背面将不再刻有“iPad Pro”字样。

## 不确定传闻：双前置摄像头

*   此前有传闻称，下一代iPad Pro将配备两个前置摄像头，以便在人像和风景模式下都能轻松进行拍照和视频通话。
*   然而，开箱视频中没有发现第二个前置摄像头的证据，仅在一个视频中看到顶部边框有一个环境光传感器。
*   彭博社的Mark Gurman在Power On时事通讯中评论称：“我可以肯定地说，苹果内部的M5 iPad Pro拥有第二个镜头。”他认为如果取消这一功能，将是一个奇怪的、最后一刻的决定。

## 发布时间

苹果很可能在本月发布下一代iPad Pro机型，官方公告预计将在几周内公布。

![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Cool](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1af4XiY5l7MKT5h6GgPqIg0XEhQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Cool.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 下一代iPad Pro预计将搭载M5芯片和至少12GB内存。泄露的基准测试显示M5芯片的CPU和图形性能显著提升。俄罗斯YouTube频道的开箱视频揭示了这些信息，并显示背面将不再刻有“iPad Pro”字样。然而，此前关于双前置摄像头的传闻在视频中未得到证实，尽管有报道称苹果内部版本包含此功能。苹果预计将在本月发布新iPad Pro。
items.translated_title: 下一代iPad Pro将拥有两大关键特性，但一项传闻仍不确定
items.content:
The next iPad Pro models are rumored to feature two key upgrades, including Apple's M5 chip, and an increased minimum of 12GB of RAM.


Last week, apparent unboxing videos for the next-generation 13-inch iPad Pro were uploaded to YouTube by Russian channels Wylsacom and Romancev768.

The same YouTube channels leaked the 14-inch MacBook Pro with the M4 chip before it was announced by Apple last year, so these latest leaks are likely legitimate.

The unboxing videos showed the M5 chip, and an increased minimum of 12GB of RAM.

According to Geekbench 6 benchmark results shown in one of the videos, the M5 chip offers up to 12% faster multi-core CPU performance and up to 36% faster graphics performance compared to the M4 chip in the current iPad Pro models from May 2024.

The benchmark result also showed the iPad Pro with 256GB of storage will have 12GB of RAM, just like the iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max. iPad Pro models with the M4 chip have only 8GB of RAM when equipped with 256GB or 512GB of storage, but models with 1TB or 2TB of storage are equipped with 16GB of RAM.

Last year, the iPad Pro was updated with an OLED display and a thinner design. No major design changes are expected this year, but the unboxing videos did reveal that "iPad Pro" will no longer be inscribed on the back of the next models.

Beyond the M5 chip and a minimum of 12GB of RAM, a third rumor is in jeopardy.

It was previously rumored that the next iPad Pro models would have two front cameras, allowing you to easily take photos and go on video calls in both portrait and landscape orientations. However, there is no evidence of a second front camera in the unboxing videos, with only an ambient light sensor visible in the top bezel in one of the videos.

In his Power On newsletter today, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman commented on the rumor:
I can say with certainty that M5 iPad Pros within Apple have the second lens. There's a history of Apple testing features at an advanced stage before pulling them (such as certain storage capacities or features like a second dock connector on the original iPad), but this would be a strange, last-minute cut.
We shall see. Apple will likely unveil the next iPad Pro models this month, so an official announcement is likely just a few weeks away.

items.title: 头条新闻：十月苹果发布会？新硬件泄露及更多 (原标题: Top Stories: October Apple Event?, New Hardware Leaks, and More)
items.creator: MacRumors Staff
items.summary:
# 十月苹果发布会展望、新硬件泄露及更多

## 引言
随着日历翻到十月，苹果公司在2025年仍有产品发布计划。预计多个产品线将迎来更新，且苹果历来有在十月发布新品的传统。近期，俄罗斯YouTube博主和美国监管数据库的泄露事件揭示了一些即将推出的产品，尽管发布时间尚不明确。本周还发布了iOS及其他平台的错误修复更新，同时我们对苹果新款iPhone的看法也更加成熟。

![top stories 2025 10 04](https://images.macrumors.com/t/R8FJrH3TA3I1to7wt9QSbToKg6Q=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/top-stories-2025-10-04.jpg?lossy)

## 十月苹果发布会？期待什么
虽然苹果年度iPhone发布会已过去，但有传言称公司计划在年底前发布至少一批额外产品。目前尚不确定十月是否会有另一场苹果发布会，或者将通过一系列新闻稿来介绍新产品。文章回顾了苹果近期十月发布会的历史，并概述了传闻中即将推出的产品。

![Tim Cook Rainbow](https://images.macrumors.com/t/bbb9-63GOpljygN6O5yti_qjbMQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/Tim-Cook-Rainbow.jpg?lossy)

## M5芯片iPad Pro开箱视频泄露
俄罗斯YouTube频道Wyslacom似乎再次成功泄露。继一年前通过开箱视频泄露M4 MacBook Pro后，他们又通过即将推出的M5 iPad Pro重复了这一壮举。尽管该设备外观与当前型号基本相同，但它标志着M5芯片的首次亮相，视频中还包含了一些新芯片的良好基准测试。

![ipad pro m5 leak thumb](https://images.macrumors.com/t/505t2f44CXqTR9ZSY0rVIHN9Y1U=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ipad-pro-m5-leak-thumb.jpg?lossy)

## FCC泄露即将推出的MacBook Pro及更多产品
美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）无意中证实了苹果即将发布的几款产品，其中包括一款新的MacBook Pro，这很可能是一款基于M5芯片的型号，预计将于今年晚些时候或明年初推出。文件还证实了几款新的iPad，很可能是M5 iPad Pro，以及一款此前传闻将升级芯片的新款Vision Pro。

![macbook pro prime day 2025](https://images.macrumors.com/t/GCRSL0Nm5icLM5iY5XCKsEjJrNk=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/macbook-pro-prime-day-2025.jpeg?lossy)

## 苹果发布iOS 26.0.1，修复iPhone 17机型Wi-Fi、蜂窝网络和摄像头问题
本周，苹果发布了iOS 26.0.1更新，以解决iOS 26初始版本和新iPhone硬件中的多项错误，包括新iPhone上的Wi-Fi/蓝牙和摄像头问题、蜂窝网络问题、应用图标着色问题等。苹果还发布了macOS Tahoe 26.0.1，以解决M3 Ultra Mac Studio设备无法更新到macOS Tahoe的问题，以及watchOS 26.0.2、visionOS 26.0.1和tvOS 26.0.1的次要更新。

![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/V739eP42yq6TtFd07tzOfbtmHbs=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.0.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## 评测：iPhone 17 Pro一周体验
MacRumors的视频制作人Dan Barbera分享了他对iPhone 17 Pro、Pro Max以及超薄iPhone Air的体验感受。

*   **Pro型号**：展现出令人印象深刻的电池续航提升和散热改进，升级后的前置摄像头为自拍带来了良好的质量提升。升级后的长焦镜头也是一个受欢迎的补充，尽管早期有关于演示机划痕的担忧，但他尚未发现任何耐用性问题。
*   **iPhone Air**：手感极佳，钛金属边框美观坚固，但该设备也伴随着一些妥协，例如电池续航时间较短和只有一个后置摄像头。

![iphone 17 pros dan hands on](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-O8XrxajLnL3A5ARs78iuiwvXt0=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/iphone-17-pros-dan-hands-on.jpg?lossy)

## LG UltraFine 6K (32U990A) TB5显示器：现已接受预订
今年一月在CES上，LG宣布了其声称是首款支持Thunderbolt 5的6K显示器，现在已可通过B&H Photo等零售商进行预订。这款显示器售价2000美元，但如果将其视为苹果售价5000多美元的Pro Display XDR的替代品，这个价格就显得非常有吸引力。它提供6144 x 3456分辨率显示屏，支持菊花链连接，为连接的笔记本电脑提供96瓦电力传输，并支持倾斜、旋转、高度和旋转调整，以及DisplayPort和HDMI输入接口，同时具备Thunderbolt 5接口。

![LG UltraFine 6K Display TB5](https://images.macrumors.com/t/QGUUK_r5AtkyOuHcEo4M8hTbivM=/400x0/article-new/2025/01/LG-UltraFine-6K-Display-TB5.jpg?lossy)

## 其他热门新闻简述
*   **iOS 26.1至iOS 26.4将新增功能**：包括Apple Intelligence和AirPods上的实时翻译支持更多语言，以及Apple Music、日历、照片和Safari的一些小改动。
*   **新款iPhone需求“强于预期”**：iPhone 17系列发布近两周后，分析师表示其需求“略强于最初预期”。
*   **泄露的苹果产品**：M5芯片iPad Pro、更新的MacBook Pro和Apple Vision Pro已通过YouTube视频和FCC文件泄露。
*   **iPhone驾驶证功能**：现已在美国11个州可用。
*   **苹果2025年产品路线图**：预计Apple TV将获得芯片升级。
items.shortSummary: 苹果预计2025年十月将有更多产品发布，M5芯片iPad Pro、M5 MacBook Pro和更新的Vision Pro已通过泄露曝光。iOS 26.0.1发布以修复iPhone 17系列问题。iPhone 17 Pro型号在电池和摄像头方面有显著改进，而iPhone Air则以轻薄设计和一些功能妥协为特点。此外，LG首款支持Thunderbolt 5的6K显示器现已接受预订。

items.content:
The calendar has flipped over to October, but that doesn't mean Apple is done with product launches for 2025. We're still expecting updates to several product lines, and Apple has a history of making announcements in October so we'll be keeping a lookout for news.


Several of those upcoming products have already leaked thanks to Russian YouTubers and U.S. regulatory databases, although release timing remains a bit unclear. This week also saw the release of bug-fix updates for iOS and other platforms, while have had a bit more time for our thoughts on Apple's new iPhones to firm up, so read on below for all the details on these stories and more!

Top Stories


Apple Event in October? Here's What to Expect


Apple's annual iPhone event is in the rear-view mirror, but rumors suggest the company plans to release at least a handful of additional products before the year ends.


Will there be another Apple event this October, or will we see a string of press releases to introduce the new products? Check out our look at Apple's recent October announcement history and our overview of what's rumored to be launching soon.

New iPad Pro With M5 Chip Leaked in Unboxing Video


Russian YouTube channel Wyslacom appears to have done it again. A year after leaking the M4 MacBook Pro with an unboxing video, they've repeated the feat with the upcoming M5 iPad Pro.


While the device looks essentially identical to the current model, it does mark the premiere of the M5 chip, and the video includes some good benchmarks of the new chip.

FCC Leaks Upcoming MacBook Pro and More


The United States Federal Communications Commission has inadvertently confirmed several upcoming releases from Apple, including a new MacBook Pro that is likely an M5-based model expected later this year or early next year.


The documents also confirm several new iPads that are likely to be the M5 iPad Pro, and a new Vision Pro that has been previously rumored to be coming with a chip bump was also revealed.

Apple Releases iOS 26.0.1 With Fixes for Wi-Fi, Cellular, and Camera Issues on iPhone 17 Models


Apple this week pushed out an iOS 26.0.1 update to address several bugs from the initial iOS 26 release and the new iPhone hardware, including Wi-Fi/Bluetooth and Camera issues on the new iPhones, cellular network issues, app icon tinting problems, and more.


Apple also released macOS Tahoe 26.0.1 to address an issue with M3 Ultra Mac Studio machines being unable to update to macOS Tahoe, as well as minor watchOS 26.0.2, visionOS 26.0.1, and tvOS 26.0.1 updates.

Review: A Week With the iPhone 17 Pro


We've now had a chance to spend some extended time with Apple's latest phones, and MacRumors videographer Dan Barbera has put together his thoughts on the iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max, as well as the ultra-thin iPhone Air.


The Pro models are showing impressive battery life gains and thermal improvements, while the upgraded front-facing camera delivers nice quality improvements for selfies. The upgraded Telephoto lens is also a welcome addition, and he's yet to see any durability issues despite some early concerns over scratches seen on demo units.

The iPhone Air is a dream to hold, and its titanium frame is beautiful and strong, but there's no hiding that the device comes with some compromises like shorter battery life and only a single rear camera.

LG UltraFine 6K (32U990A) TB5 Display: Pre-Orders Now Available


Back in January at CES, LG announced what it said is the first 6K display to support Thunderbolt 5, and it is now available for pre-order from retailers like B&H Photo. The display will run you $2,000, but if you think of it as an alternative to Apple's $5,000+ Pro Display XDR, that pricing starts to look a lot better.


You'll get a 6,144 x 3,456 display with daisy-chain support, 96-watt power delivery for a connected laptop, and tilt, pivot, height, and rotation adjustments, as well as DisplayPort and HDMI inputs alongside Thunderbolt 5.

MacRumors Newsletter


Each week, we publish an email newsletter like this highlighting the top Apple stories, making it a great way to get a bite-sized recap of the week hitting all of the major topics we've covered and tying together related stories for a big-picture view.

So if you want to have top stories like the above recap delivered to your email inbox each week, subscribe to our newsletter!
